title: Roasted spiced nuts
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon coriander seeds', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '1/4 teaspoon fennel seeds', '1/2 cinnamon stick', '1/2 teaspoon black peppercorns', '1 teaspoon ground tumeric', '2 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '2 teaspoons sea salt', '350g mixed nuts (such as almonds, pecans, peanuts, cashews)', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
